maxBetToolTip: Spin with Maximum setting on total bet.

allPaysContent: Adjacent reels pay left to right without any specific line configuration

howToWinContent1: The prize value from a payline is calculated by dividing the total bet by the number of paylines played, then multiply the matching symbol's win multiplier displayed in the Paytable page.
Only the highest win is paid per line.
When wins occur on multiple lines, all win values are summed.
Example: A stake of 2 played with 50 lines will result in a 0.04 bet per line. If a symbol that matches 5 times pays 150 times, multiply 0.04 by 150 to get 6 in prize won.
howToWinContent2: The prize value from a payway is equal to the stake amount multiplied by the symbol’s win multiplier shown under the Symbols & Pay Value section within the Paytable page. If the payout values are shown with a specific coin wager, divide the prize value by the coin amount to calculate your win.

Example: A stake of 2 that matches a combination that pays 15 times will result in a total prize of 30. If the pay values are shown with a wager of 10 coins, divide 30 by 10 to get your total win of 3.

content1: Da Hong Bao Gold is a 5 reels, 4 rows 50-line slot game played with 50 fixed lines. In addition to the original features, the sequel adds a new way to win with the Da Hong Bao Extra Bonus.
content2-1: Hit 2 Scatters for a chance to trigger the Da Hong Bao Extra Bonus.
Pick and match 3 symbols from 12 icons to win up to 888X on your bet!
content2-2: Major Bonus: 3 Da Hong Bao symbols award 88X
Grand Bonus: 3 God of Wealth symbols award 888X
content2-3: 3 or 4 Scatters award a re-spin on the non-Scatter reels. Any improvements from 3 to 4 Scatters trigger a second re-spin.
content2-4: Hit 3, 4, or 5 Scatters to trigger the Free Spins features:
content2-4-1: 3 Scatters activates the Lucky Spins Feature: 12 free spins with all wins involving one or more Wild symbols paid double.
4 Scatters activates the Fortune Spins Feature: 12 free spins with one Wild symbol is added on the reels for every spin, starting from the button right position.

5 Scatters activates the Dragon Spins Feature: 12 free spins with one Wild symbol is added on the reels for every spin, starting from the button right position. Wins involving one or more Wild symbols are also paid double!
content2-4-2: All free spins features are retriggered with 3 or more Scatters symbols.
content3: All Symbols from the above are paid per line.
Wilds can appear anywhere on the reels and substitute all symbols except for Scatters.
Scatter symbols can appear anywhere on the reels.

introductionContent1: Da Hong Bao Gold is a 5 reels, 4 rows 50-line slot game played with 50 fixed lines. In addition to its original features, the game offers a new way to win with the Da Hong Bao Extra Bonus feature.
featureContent1: Da Hong Bao Extra Bonus is randomly triggered in base game and free spins when 2 Scatters appear.
12 icons will appear for a pick and click bonus. Select until 3 matching symbols occur to trigger a bonus win:
featureSubContent1: Mini Bonus: 3 Temple symbols award 8X on your bet.
Minor Bonus: 3 Dragon symbols award 18X on your bet.
Major Bonus: 3 Da Hong Bao symbols award 88X on your bet.
Grand Bonus: 3 God of Wealth symbols award 888X on your bet.
featureContent2: 3 or 4 Scatters award a re-spin on the non-Scatter reels. Any improvements from 3 to 4 Scatters trigger a second re-spin.
Re-spins are awarded after line wins are paid. Line wins are not paid after the re-spin.
featureContent3: 3 Scatters trigger the Lucky Spins Feature and awards 12 free spins.
Line wins with one or more Wild symbols are paid double for each spin.
3 or more Scatters retrigger the feature and adds 12 additional free spins.
featureContent4: 4 Scatters trigger the Fortune Spins Feature and awards 12 free spins.
For each spin, one Wild symbol is added on the reels for every spin, starting from the button right position.
3 or more Scatters award a new Fortune Spins Feature, played after the end of the current feature.
featureContent5: 5 Scatters trigger the Dragon Spin Feature and awards 12 free spins.
For each spin, one Wild symbol is added on the reels for every spin, starting from the button right position. Line wins with one or more Wild symbols are also paid double.
3 or more Scatters award a new Dragon Spins Feature, played after the end of the current feature.
